description.narrative: The Project's expected impact is: farm and non-farm incomes of rural households are increased. The outcome of the Project is increased productivity of farms and rural enterprises in Faizabod, Rudaki, Rogun, Vahdat and Varzob within an environmentally sustainable management framework. The Project will support individual and cooperative dehkan farms, households, and private rural entrepreneurs.
